name: Robot Escape (The Great Cacti)
description:
Robot Escape is a game where two robots are stuck in a tower. You must guide both robots to escape, but with a twist: both robots will execute the same instructions!

If you want your scores to be recorded, type a username in the box during the introduction. If you do not enter a username, your score will not be recorded.

Note: Do not use the "Quit Game" button in the web version, as it may crash the game. 

Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.
